prompts.promptText: Which country's team won the first World Cup in 1930?
Which of these foods goes by the Japanese name "ikura"?
Who is Kanye West currently married to?
Which of these components doesn't belong in the popular Italian cocktail Aperol Spritz?
The Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia was comprised of which republics?

options.text: Serbia, Croatia, Hungary, Romania, and Albania
Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia, Albania, Kosovo, and Bulgaria
Serbia, Croatia, Slovenia, Montenegro, Bosnia, and Herzegovina and Macedonia
Croatia, Montenegro, Herzegovina and Macedonia, Romania, Bosnia, and Kosovo

prompts.promptText: Which musician or music group has never won a Grammy?
Which of the following languages is not represented in an inscription on the Rosetta Stone?

options.text: A cornett-like bass instrument invented in the late 16th century
An Irish frame drum ranging from 25-65 cm in diameter
A metallic-stringed instrument stretched across a thin, flat body
An electronic instrument controlled without physical contact

prompts.promptText: Which of these is not a lobe of the human brain?
